name: Multilingual Voice & Text Telegram Bot with ElevenLabs TTS and LangChain Agents

user.name: IvanCore
user.bio:
Hi,

I‚Äôm a botmaker and automation enthusiast, specializing in creating efficient systems and solutions to streamline processes. My expertise lies in developing bots and automation tools that save ‚è±Ô∏è time, enhance üìà productivity, and simplify üîÑ complex tasks.

If you‚Äôd like to learn more or connect with me, feel free to reach out through the link below ü§ù

description:
*This workflow contains community nodes that are only compatible with the self-hosted version of n8n.* 

# Telegram Voice AI Assistant
This n8n template creates a **multimodal Telegram bot** that dynamically responds to users:

- **Replies with voice** when receiving voice messages (using ElevenLabs TTS)

- **Replies with text** for text-based queries

- Supports **custom AI tools** (e.g., crypto APIs, databases, or custom functions)

Built with **LangChain Agents**, it can integrate any external API or data source into conversations.

## Key Features
üéôÔ∏è **Smart Response Logic**
- **Voice Query? ‚Üí Voice Reply**
1. Transcribes audio via ElevenLabs STT
2. Processes with AI (Groq/Gemini)
3. Converts text response to natural speech (ElevenLabs TTS)

- **Text Query? ‚Üí Text Reply**
Bypasses TTS/STT for faster responses

üõ†Ô∏è **Extensible AI Tools**
Add your own tools:
- Database lookups
- Weather/stock APIs
- Custom Python functions
- RAG (document retrieval)

Supports **multi-step tool chaining** (e.g., "Get BTC price ‚Üí analyze trends ‚Üí summarize")

üåê **Language & Context**
- Auto-detects user language (via Telegram‚Äôs *language_code*)
- Maintains **session memory** (remembers conversation history)

## Use Cases
- **Voice-first customer support**
- **Crypto/analytics assistants** (e.g., "What‚Äôs Ethereum‚Äôs current gas fee?")
- **Multilingual FAQ bots**
- **Educational tutors** (voice-interactive learning)

## Requirements
- **Telegram Bot Token**
- **ElevenLabs API Key** (For TTS/STT)
- **Groq API Key** or **Google Gemini API Key**

## Customization Tips
- **Change AI personality**: Modify the *systemMessage* in the Voice Assistant node
- **Add more models**: Swap Groq/Gemini for OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.
- **Extend functionality**: Add RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) for document queries

Take this template to create a **Siri-like AI assistant** for Telegram in minutes! üöÄ

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

options.systemMessage: You are the woman **CoinMarketCap AI Data Analyst**, a powerful, multi-source crypto intelligence system that integrates three specialized agents...

parameters.content:
**Auto-language detection**:  
- Uses `message.from.language_code` (e.g., "ru", "es")  
- Ensure ElevenLabs model = `eleven_multilingual_v2`  
- Override with `languageCode` in TTS node if needed

üéôÔ∏è Voice/Text Routing Logic

**How messages are processed:**

- **Voice Message Path:**
  1. Get voice file ‚Üí ElevenLabs STT ‚Üí Set `voice=true` flag
  2. AI processes text ‚Üí ElevenLabs TTS ‚Üí Send voice reply

- **Text Message Path:**
  1. Bypass STT/TTS ‚Üí Direct to AI
  2. Send text reply

*Switch node uses:*
`={{ $json.message.text }}` empty check

## üõ†Ô∏è Custom Tools Integration

**To add your own tools:**
1. Edit `systemMessage` in Voice Assistant node
2. Add tool descriptions in format:
```python
Tool(
    name=\"YourTool\",
    func=tool_function,
    description=\"What it does\"
)
```

**Example tools:**
- Database queries
- API integrations
- Math/code executors

*Connect required nodes to fetch data
